name: Elevator Simulator.
description:
In elevator sims, you can control your own elevator as you navigate around inside of a mysterious building.  WITH MORE THAN NINE WHOLE FLOORS TO EXPLORE!!

To move press the W.A.S.D keys on the keyboard. And use the Space Bar key to interact with objects in the game. FROM THE CREATORS OF SHREK'S WONDERLAND...

You can discover many interesting things in this video game.

Traverse many floors, in this new game. Okay???!!! Go ahead, try it out why don'tcha bro. ;)
